description: Number of partitions of n into parts 6k+2 or 6k+4.
formula: a(2*n) = A000726(n). a(2*n + 1) = 0. - _Michael Somos_, Jun 02 2012If n is even, a(n) ~ exp(Pi*sqrt(2*n)/3) / (3 * 2^(1/4) * n^(3/4)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 27 2015
mathematica: nmax = 100; CoefficientList[Series[Product[1/((1 - x^(6k+2))*(1 - x^(6k+4))), {k, 0, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 27 2015 *)
